uvi.description:
usbnet: sanity check for maxpacket

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.14.16 by commit 7e8b6a4f18edee070213cb6a77118e8a412253c5. For more details please see the references link.
